attributes.action: Exempt existing skilled worker from Increasing ILR time from 5 to 10 years
attributes.additional_details: Because existing skilled workers are here based on existing rules and regulations
attributes.background: Exempt existing skilled worker from Increasing settlement and citizenship time from 5 to 10 years Or clarify if its already considered as exemption in submission of white paper

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
